definitions.definition: Any of various large insects of the order Mantodea that catch insects or other small animals with their powerful forelegs.
A green colour , like that of many mantises. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: Any of various large insects of the order Mantodea that catch insects or other small animals with their powerful forelegs.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A green colour , like that of many mantises. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
